Cc: Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com <mailto:s.vasilev@tibiel.com> >; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >; PKICA-Services <PKICA-Services@athexgroup.gr <mailto:PKICA-Services@athexgroup.gr> >
Subject: RE: Client Authentication Certificate PKISVC-18569 - [ΕΜΠΙΣΤΕΥΤΙΚΟ]

 

[ ΔΙΑΒΑΘΜΙΣΗ: ΕΜΠΙΣΤΕΥΤΙΚΟ ]

 

Dear all,

 

Below is the procedure for a new user.

 

1.	Fill in the new application-agreement located at the link: https://repo.athexgroup.gr/ATHEXApplication4ClientAuthEN.pdf <https://repo.athexgroup.gr/ATHEXApplication4ClientAuthEN.pdf> 
2.	Application-agreement and the supporting documents 3 and 4 of the VII.SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS table on page 3 can be signed in one of the following ways:

i.	Electronically using a Qualified Electronic Signature (according to eiDAS).
ii.	Before a Certifying Public Authority – Only Apostille Stamp is accepted, which will certify the authenticity of the signature. Please keep in mind that: a) application agreement or any other supporting document which is not in English has to be translated to be accepted by us.   

3.	The supporting documents 1, 2, 3 of the VII.SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS table on page 3 are obligatory to be submitted with your application-agreement.
4.	Supporting document number 4 of VII table (Authorization Letter for Certificate Approvers) is required to be submitted once each year, if the legal representative of the organization has given the jurisdiction to a third party (certificate approver) to approve application agreements for certificates issuance for the above systems. 
5.	Especially for the use of the CSE Clearing System, a relevant certificate of use of the CSE Clearing System issued by Cyprus Stock Exchange is required.

 

It is noted that upon receipt of the application agreement, the e-mail and mobile phone number you have filled in will be verified. You will receive instructions for verification.

Proof of deposit of the amount corresponding  of your certificate equals to 40€ plus 24%, total 49,6€. 

1.	If invoice is sent to a legal entity, then VAT is required to be paid:

	*	In case the head office of legal entity is established in Greece or 
	*	In case the head office of legal entity is established in any another member-state of the European Union and the legal entity is also not registered to VAT Information Exchange System (VIES).The URL of the VIES is: https://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/vies/ <https://ec.europa.eu/taxation_customs/vies/> 

The VAT is not required to be paid by legal entity in all other cases.

2.	If the invoice is sent to an individual, then VAT is required to be paid only if he/she is established in Greece.  

 

The deposit can be made in one of the following accounts:

110 Athens Avenue

At your disposal for any question!

To Whom it may concern,

 

Following the admission of new users of our company ( Tibiel Henex Admission Decision No. 27/2023) to HEnEx Xnet trading platform, it would be appreciated if you could inform us regarding the process required in order to obtain the Client Authentication Certificate.

 

Kind Regards,

 

Athanasios Karantzis  

Head of Supply and Gas Trading  of TIBIEL EOOD in Greece
